channel.title: Vsauce
channel.description:
Our World is Amazing.
Questions? Ideas? Tweet me: http://www.twitter.com/tweetsauce
Vsauce was created by Michael Stevens in the summer of 2010.
Vsauce is...
Michael Stevens: Producer/Host of Vsauce1 Kevin Lieber: Producer/Host of Vsauce2 Jake Roper: Producer/Host of Vsauce3 Eric Langlay: VFX for Vsauce1/2/3 You: Thanks for watching!!!
